about_the_game:
Explore the art of Cats Hidden in Italy in this beautiful Coloring Book. Each page has been specifically designed to suit even the youngest artists. A PDF file with a resolution suitable for printing and digital drawing is included.

Additionally, you will find a giant poster of the whole Cats Hidden in Italy artwork.

Please share your paintings in the community section! Maybe it could end up in the game one day! :)

Contents

  • Coloring Book
  • Poster

Right-click on the game in your library to access the files:
